topics.body:
"@Kaz":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55abe2306368721459000792#post_55abe2306368721459000792
I added a little warning to the top of the post.
Now about this whole "the person who posted the thread said SFW!". This entire subforum is SFW _as a rule_; you could put [NSFW] and there would be the same requirements to spoil and warn stuff like that.
Also, neither the thread author, nor anyone in the thread, dictates what content is allowed, with the exception of topic relatedness.
